questions.question: That was the ……………………… sensible thing to do.
questions.description: The superlative adjective is usually used with the.

questions.question: Who is the …………………………. boy in the class?
questions.description: The superlative adjective is usually used with the.

questions.question: I was not at all …………………………
questions.description: When there is no idea of comparison we use the positive adjective.

questions.question: The bride smiled ……………………….. at the guests.
questions.description: When there is no idea of comparison we use the positive adjective or adverb.

questions.question: When I met her yesterday she looked ………………………….. than before.
questions.description: Use a comparative expression before than.

questions.question: That was the …………………………… day of my life.
I earned much …………………….. today than yesterday.
questions.description: Less is the comparative form of little.

questions.question: I have ………………………… respect for dishonest people.

questions.question: She works ………………………… than anybody I know.

questions.question: I am the ……………………….. singer in my family.
questions.description: Use the superlative form after the.
